timeline.bodyText:
I think other methods using the PERSONA_QUERY also need to filter out deleted personas.
We should probably just add the WHERE condition to PERSONA_QUERY.
Similar check probably needs to be added to queries in PersonaAccount ?
timeline.author: raman-bt

timeline.bodyText:
setName is already a method defined in the JPanel class
We should rename this to setPersonaName()
timeline.author: raman-bt
